content: Drink lots of water to stay fresh and juicy... Ah, I was just thinking out loud! {A害羞挠头}The plants must love that watering bucket in your hand.
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持浇水壶-12绵朵_引入语

content: Wet plants and dry plants give off completely different scents. Don't believe me? Test it out with your watering bucket!
